home_advantage1_description: Experienced operators with certificates and over 10 years of experience ensure safety at every site.
home_advantage2_description: Our entire crane fleet undergoes scheduled maintenance and daily technical inspections before deployment.
home_advantage3_description: Mobile cranes from leading global manufacturers with capacities ranging from 30 to 100 tons.
home_advantage4_description: All operations are performed in accordance with Kazakhstan safety requirements and international standards.
home_service1_description: Highway mobile cranes with 30-ton capacity for medium-complexity construction and installation work.
home_service2_description: Powerful 50-ton mobile cranes for handling heavy structures and equipment.
home_service3_description: Heavy-duty 80-ton mobile cranes for large industrial and construction sites.
home_service4_description: The most powerful 100-ton mobile cranes for highly complex projects.
home_service5_description: All cranes are provided with professional operators who have the necessary certificates and years of experience.
home_service6_description: Regular technical maintenance and safety inspections of our entire mobile crane fleet.
clients_showcase_description: We are proud to work with leading Kazakhstani and international companies that trust us to supply quality construction equipment for their projects.
clients_showcase_additional_info: Join hundreds of companies that have chosen InterTransService for their construction equipment needs.
home_director_quote: Over the years, we have learned that success in equipment rental is built on three pillars: reliable equipment, professional operators, and impeccable service. We invest in modern machinery, continuously improve our crane operators' qualifications, and guarantee timely equipment delivery to your site. Your success is our reputation.
home_company_description: A dynamically developing company that has established itself as a
home_company_highlight: reliable partner in highway mobile crane rental
home_company_suffix: with a modern fleet of equipment ranging from 30 to 100 tons capacity.
